item.title: Tidyverse: rows as vectors?
item.description: This has been bothering me for a while: is there a good simple way to apply a formula to rows of a data frame or table, where the formula would consume the rows as vectors? Motivation The section 3.3 of the Introductory Statistics with Randomization and Simulation contains the following example: In the first case, we consider data from a random sample of 275 jurors in a small county.
